subject: McCain's In, But Can He Win?
body:
Tonight On CNN Email







April 25, 2007








 





9 p.m. ET


 

Larry King Live:   McCain's In, But Can He Win?


U.S. Sen. John McCain's first interview since officially entering the presidential race. Plus, Donald Trump reacts to Rosie O'Donnell's decision to exit "The View." Tune in tonight at 9 p.m. ET.









Related:• Can McCain campaign get traction?• McCain off to poor start







 
 





 




6:00 a.m. ET


 

American Morning


John McCain, back in the race for 2008. His stance on Iran and the war... John Roberts asks him the tough questions you want answered.










 





6:00 p.m. ET


 

Lou Dobbs Tonight


U.S. engineer Chi Mak: On trail for allegedly spying for the Chinese government. We'll have a live report from Santa Ana.







7:00 p.m. ET


 

The Situation Room


>From chaos to carnage: do Iraqis have the political will to make peace?  Join Wolf in the Situation Room.







8:00 p.m. ET


 

Paula Zahn NOW


The controversial Rosie O'Donnell is leaving "The View".  Why now? Inside her exit plans.









9:00 p.m. ET


 

Larry King Live


U.S. Sen. John McCain's first interview since officially entering the presidential race.  Plus, Donald Trump reacts to Rosie O'Donnell's decision to leave "The View."







10:00 p.m. ET


 

Anderson Cooper 360


A rapper's bodyguard killed. Police say as many as 25 people saw it happen. Why isn't anyone talking?
